data.comment: The match has started at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Lille.
In the minute 4, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Lille.
Free kick Lille.
In the minute 7, Lille have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Florian Sotoca for Lens drives towards goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Lille in the half of Lens.
Burak Yilmaz scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Francois Letexier signals a Lille throw-in in Lens's half.
In the minute 14, Lens are whistled for offside.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille.
In the minute 18, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yannick Cahuzac (Lens) gets a yellow card.
Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lens's half?
In the minute 19, Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Lens's area.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Lens to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Francois Letexier awards Lille a goal kick.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in high up the field for Lens in Lille.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Goal kick for Lens at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
Lille push forward at Stade Pierre Mauroy and Luiz Araujo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lens defence.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Lille are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Francois Letexier signals a Lens throw-in in Lille's half.
Free kick Lille.
In the minute 30, Lens's Jonathan Gradit has been booked in Lille.
Burak Yilmaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lille.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 32, Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Zeki Celik (Lille) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Lille.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 37, Gael Kakuta for Lens gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 39, Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Lille Lille attack through Jonathan David. The finish is off target, however.
Lens have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Luiz Araujo of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Lens in the half of Lille.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Lille.
In the minute 45, Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
The first half has been concluded at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
The second-half is underway at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Arnaud Kalimuendo is on a sub for Corentin Jean for Lens.
In the minute 48, Goal! Jonathan Bamba extends Lille's lead to 2-0.
Zeki Celik instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Lens.
In the minute 50, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Lille.
In the minute 53, Lille needs to be cautious. Lens have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Lens!
Lens attack but Cheick Oumar Doucoure's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 54, Francois Letexier awards Lille a goal kick.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Lille's Domagoj Bradaric gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Lens at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Throw-in for Lens close to the penalty box.
In the minute 57, Free kick Lille.
Jonathan Gradit has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Lille drive upfield and Renato Sanches gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lens defender.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a second substitution, with Tony Mauricio replacing Yannick Cahuzac.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Lens.
Francois Letexier signals a Lille throw-in in Lens's half.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 65, Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team replace Benjamin Andre with Xeka.
Jonathan Ikone is replacing Burak Yilmaz for the home team.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Jonathan Ikone extends Lille's lead to 3-0.
Jonathan Bamba with an assist there.
In the minute 70, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Franck Haise is making the team's third substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Simon Banza replacing Gael Kakuta.
The away team have replaced Jonathan Clauss with Clement Michelin. This is the fourth substitution made today by Franck Haise.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 74, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Lille.
Clement Michelin (Lens) is red-carded and dismissed.
In the minute 76, Lille make their third substitution with Yusuf Yazici replacing Luiz Araujo.
Lens to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Boubakary Soumare is replacing Renato Sanches for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 77, Botman Sven is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Botman Sven returns to the field for Lille after picking up a slight injury.
Goal! Lille extend their lead to 4-0 through Yusuf Yazici.
In the minute 79, That's a fine assist from Jonathan Bamba.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Lens make their fifth substitution with Ismael Boura replacing Florian Sotoca.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Lens.
Adama Soumaoro is replacing Jose Fonte for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 83, Lille have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Lille's Yusuf Yazici breaks free at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
Lens to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Lille have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Lille in the half of Lens.
In Lille, Jonathan Bamba of Lille is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The match has come to a close in Lille. The final score is 4-0.
